title: Spack broken on Blue Waters
body:
On the current develop, no Spack command works on Blue Waters.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

Any Spack command:
```console
$ spack help
```

### Error Message

```
Traceback (most recent call last):

    return config.get(path, default, scope)
```
